model.chess_set

Class PieceSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.chess_set.PieceSet

  • public final class PieceSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a complete 'set' of Pieces for the chess Board. Two instances of PieceSet are owned by Board and referred to by two Players.
    Version:
    Mar 3, 2019
    Author:
    gemuelealudino, patricknogaj

      • promotePawn

        Piece promotePawn(Pawn pawnPiece,
                  PieceType promoType,
                  PieceType.Color color)
        Promotes a Pawn to a Queen, Bishop, Knight, or Rook. Precondition: @see Board.java, line 276 promoType must be QUEEN, BISHOP_R/L, KNIGHT_R/L, or ROOK_R/L.
        Parameters:
        pawnPiece - the Pawn to promote
        promoType - Queen, Bishop, Knight, or Rook
        color - White, or Black
        Returns:
        a promoted Pawn -- a new Queen, Bishop, Knight, or Rook
